summary: The crew of PT-73 are in trouble again when Ensign Parker poses as an Air Force pilot and sinks the Japanese fleet, without McHale.
cast: Joe Flynn|Tim Conway|Bob Hastings|Gary Vinson|Billy Sands|Edson Stroll|John Wright|Yoshio Yoda|Gavin MacLeod|Tom Tully|Susan Silo|Henry Beckman|Ted Bessell|Jean Hale|Cliff Norton|Willis Bouchey|Berkeley Harris|Jacques Aubuchon|Len Lesser|Henry Corden|Jack Bernardi|Norman Leavitt|Joe Ploski|Andy Albin|Clay Tanner|Tony Franke|Paul Bradley|Robert Buckingham|Albert Cavens|George DeNormand|Karen Dolin|Sharron Frye|Stuart Hall|Eddie Hanley|Kathryn Harrow|Lee Krieger|Mako|Sally Mansfield|Robert Millar|Nelson Olmsted|Gary Owens|Michael Pataki|John Pedrini|Allen Pinson|Paul Power|Jeffrey Sayre|Robert Strong|Sandy Williams
title: McHale's Navy Joins the Air Force
